DOC.brief_summary: This survey conduct prepare application material re-examination Pharmaceutical Affairs Laws Enforcement Regulation , aim reconfirm clinical usefulness sitagliptin/metformin ( JANUMET ) collect safety efficacy information accord Re-examination Regulation New Drugs .
DOC.criteria: Has type 2 diabetes mellitus Is treat sitagliptin/metformin within local label first time Has contraindication sitagliptin/metformin accord local label Is treat sitagliptin/metformin contract enrollment period
